description: Gets information about an existing Amazon Q Business plugin.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the application which contains the plugin.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the application which contains the plugin.

nested_items.name: pluginId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the plugin.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The name of the plugin.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the plugin.

nested_items.name: serverUrl
nested_items.description: The source URL used for plugin configuration.

nested_items.name: authConfiguration
nested_items.description: Authentication configuration information for an Amazon Q Business plugin.

nested_items.name: basicAuthConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information about the basic authentication credentials used to configure a plugin.

nested_items.name: secretArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Secrets Manager secret that stores the basic authentication credentials used for plugin configuration..

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an IAM role used by Amazon Q Business to access the basic authentication credentials stored in a Secrets Manager secret.

nested_items.name: oAuth2ClientCredentialConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information about the OAuth 2.0 authentication credential/token used to configure a plugin.

nested_items.name: secretArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Secrets Manager secret that stores the OAuth 2.0 credentials/token used for plugin configuration.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an IAM role used by Amazon Q Business to access the OAuth 2.0 authentication credentials stored in a Secrets Manager secret.

nested_items.name: authorizationUrl
nested_items.description: The redirect URL required by the OAuth 2.0 protocol for Amazon Q Business to authenticate a plugin user through a third party authentication server.

nested_items.name: tokenUrl
nested_items.description: The URL required by the OAuth 2.0 protocol to exchange an end user authorization code for an access token.

nested_items.name: noAuthConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information about invoking a custom plugin without any authentication.

nested_items.name: idcAuthConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information about the IAM Identity Center Application used to configure authentication for a plugin.

nested_items.name: idcApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM Identity Center Application used to configure authentication.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role with permissions to perform actions on Amazon Web Services services on your behalf.

nested_items.name: customPluginConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration information required to create a custom plugin.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description for your custom plugin configuration.

nested_items.name: apiSchemaType
nested_items.description: The type of OpenAPI schema to use.

nested_items.name: apiSchema
nested_items.description: Contains either details about the S3 object containing the OpenAPI schema for the action group or the JSON or YAML-formatted payload defining the schema.

nested_items.name: payload
nested_items.description: The JSON or YAML-formatted payload defining the OpenAPI schema for a custom plugin.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket that contains the file.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The name of the file.

nested_items.name: buildStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of a plugin. A plugin is modified asynchronously.

nested_items.name: pluginArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role with permission to access resources needed to create the plugin.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current state of the plugin.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the plugin was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the plugin was last updated.
